english_source: Einsteinium is a synthetic element with the symbol Es and atomic number 99. Einsteinium is a member of the actinide series and it is the seventh transuranium element. It was named in honor of Albert Einstein.

english_source: Afrocentrism, popular culture and ideology focused on the history and culture of black Africans Afrocentricity, a research method and methodological paradigm used in Black studies to center black Africans as subjects and agents within their own historical and cultural contexts

english_source: Business is the practice of making one's living or making money by producing or buying and selling products (such as goods and services).[1][2][3][4] It is also "any activity or enterprise entered into for profit."[5]

english_source: In medieval Europe, homosexuality was considered sodomy and it was punishable by death. Persecutions reached their height during the Medieval Inquisitions, when the sects of Cathars and Waldensians were accused of fornication and sodomy, alongside accusations of Satanism. In 1307, accusations of sodomy and homosexuality were major charges leveled during the Trial of the Knights Templar.[48] The theologian Thomas Aquinas was influential in linking condemnations of homosexuality with the idea of natural law, arguing that "special sins are against nature, as, for instance, those that run counter to the intercourse of male and female natural to animals, and so are peculiarly qualified as unnatural vices."[49]
target1_text: EYurophu yasendulo, ubungqingili babubhekwa njengesodomy futhi bajeziswa ngokuthi babulawe. english_source: This poor white family from Alabama was presented in 1913 as "celebrities" because they had escaped the debilitating effects of hookworm disease, which, along with pellagra was endemic among poor Southern whites due to poor sanitation and the phenomenon of "clay eating" or "dirt eating" (geophagia).

english_source: The term Othering describes the reductive action of labelling and defining a person as a subaltern native, as someone who belongs to the socially subordinate category of the Other. The practice of Othering excludes persons who do not fit the norm of the social group, which is a version of the Self;[7] likewise, in human geography, the practice of othering persons means to exclude and displace them from the social group to the margins of society, where mainstream social norms do not apply to them, for being the Other.[8]
target1_text: Itemu elithi Othering lichaza isenzo sokunciphisa sokulebula nokuchaza umuntu njengomuntu ongowokuzalwa endaweni engaphansi, njengomuntu oyingxenye yesigaba esingaphansi komphakathi somunye. Umkhuba Wokungahlangani ungabandakanyi abantu abangahambisani nenkambiso yeqembu lomphakathi, okuyinguqulo ye-Self; [1] ngokufanayo, endaweni yomuntu, umkhuba wabanye abantu usho ukubakhipha kanye nokubasusa eqenjini lenhlalakahle baye emaphethelweni omphakathi, lapho izinkambiso zomphakathi ezivamile zingasebenzi kubo, ngenxa yokuba ngomunye. [2]
target2_text: igama elithi Omunye lichaza isenzo sokunciphisa sokubizwa nokuchaza umuntu njengomuntu ongowokuzalwa endaweni engaphansi, njengomuntu oyingxenye yesigaba esingaphansi komphakathi somunye. Umkhuba Wokungahlangani ungabandakanyi abantu abangahambisani nenkambiso yeqembu lomphakathi, okuyinguqulo yobuwena ngokufanayo, endaweni yomuntu, umkhuba wabanye abantu usho ukubakhipha kanye nokubasusa eqenjini lenhlalakahle baye emaphethelweni omphakathi, lapho izinkambiso zomphakathi ezivamile zingasebenzi kubo, ngenxa yokuba ngomunye.

english_source: Cultural assimilation is the process in which a minority group or culture comes to resemble a society's majority group or assimilate the values, behaviors, and beliefs of another group whether fully or partially.[1]
target1_text: Ukulinganisa kwamasiko kuyinqubo lapho iqembu elincane noma isiko lifika lifane neqembu leningi lomphakathi noma lihlanganise izindinganiso, ukuziphatha, nezinkolelo zelinye iqembu ngokugcwele noma kancane. [1]
target2_text: Ukulinganiswa kwamasiko kuyinqubo lapho iqembu elincane noma isiko lifike lifana neningi lomphakathi noma lihlanganise izindinganiso, ukuziphatha, nezinkolelo zelinye iqembu ngokugcwele noma kancane. [1]

english_source: Those who see this appropriation as exploitative state that cultural elements are lost or distorted when they are removed from their originating cultural contexts, and that such displays are disrespectful or even a form of desecration.[1] Cultural elements that may have deep meaning to the original culture may be reduced to "exotic" fashion or toys by those from the dominant culture.[8][2][23] Kjerstin Johnson has written that, when this is done, the imitator, "who does not experience that oppression is able to 'play', temporarily, an 'exotic' other, without experiencing any of the daily discriminations faced by other cultures".[23] The black American academic, musician and journalist Greg Tate argued that appropriation and the "fetishising" of cultures, in fact, alienates those whose culture is being appropriated.[24]
target1_text: Labo ababona lokhu njengokuxhaphaza amasiko kusho ukuthi izici zamasiko ziyalahleka noma zihlanekezelwe lapho zisuswa khona ezimeni zazo zamasiko eziyindabuko, nokuthi ukubukisa okunjalo kuwukungahloniphi noma kuwuhlobo lokudelela. [1] Izici zesiko ezingase zibe nencazelo ejulile yesiko lokuqala zingancishiswa zibe "imfashini" engavamile noma amathoyizi yilawo amasiko abusayo. [1] [2] [3] U-Kjerstin Johnson ubhale ukuthi, uma lokhu sekwenziwe, umlingisi, "ongaboni ukuthi ukucindezelwa uyakwazi 'ukudlala', okwesikhashana, okunye 'okungavamile', ngaphandle kokubhekana nanoma yikuphi ukucwaswa kwansuku zonke amanye amasiko abhekana nakho". [3] Isifundiswa saseMelika esimnyama, umculi kanye nentatheli u-Greg Tate waphikisa ngokuthi ukwabiwa kanye "nokukhohlisa" kwamasiko, empeleni, kuhlukanisa labo amasiko abo asetshenziswayo. [4]

english_source: Khanyisile Mbau is a South African actress, musician, television presenter and socialite. She received recognition as the second Doobsie on SABC 2's soap opera Muvhango (2004–2005);[1] as Mbali in the SABC 1 soap opera Mzansi and SABC 1's mini-series After Nine. As of 2018, She is the host of the SABC 3 entertainment show The Scoop and The Big Secret on BET Africa, and plays Tshidi on Mzansi Magic's Abomama.[2] the artist that give South Africans the hit Songs Igwinya and Dunusa.

english_source: Tabure Thabo Bogopa Junior (born 13 March 1987), professionally known as JR, is a South African entrepreneur and musician.[1] He frequently performs Motswako rap, in both Setswana and English. He has had two number-one hip hop songs as well as two number-one pop hits on South African charts. [citation needed]

english_source: Boitumelo Thulo (born April 28, 1990), popularly known as Boity, is a South African television personality, rapper, actress, businesswoman and model. In 2019, Thulo was named as one of Forbes Africa's 30 Under 30 for her contribution in the music and entertainment sector.[1]

english_source: Another essential part of multicultural teaching is examining lesson materials for bias that might alienate students. The Safe School Coalition warns against using curricular material that "omits the history, contributions and lives of a group, if ti demeans a group by using patronizing or clinically distancing language, or if it portrays a group in stereotyped roles with less than a full range of interests, traits and capabilities."[22]

english_source: The United States saw a nationwide surge of interest in harness racing in the 1940s, fueled largely by the addition of parimutuel betting, electric lights to allow night racing, and the development of the mobile starting gate.[2] In 1947, the Maryland General Assembly (MGA) authorized up to 100 days per year of harness racing with no more than 20 racing days at one track.[3] The Ocean Downs Racing Association (ODRA), formed by a group of Eastern Shore promoters,[4] was one of 22 applicants to the Maryland Racing Commission (MRC) for harness racing licenses.[5] Four applications were approved: Ocean Downs, Laurel Raceway, Rosecroft Raceway, and Baltimore Raceway.[5]
target1_text: I-United States yabona ukwanda kwentshisekelo ezweni lonke emjahweni wamahhanisi ngeminyaka yawo-1940, okwagqugquzelwa kakhulu ukungezwa kokubheja kwe -parimutuel, amalambu kagesi okuvumela imijaho yasebusuku, kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwesango lokuqalisa elihambayo . [1] Ngo-1947, iMaryland General Assembly (MGA) yagunyaza kuze kufike ezinsukwini eziyi-100 ngonyaka zomjaho wamahhanisi ngaphandle kwezinsuku ezingaphezu kwezingama-20 zomjaho ithrekhi eyodwa. [2] I-Ocean Downs Racing Association (ODRA), eyakhiwe iqembu labagqugquzeli base -Eastern Shore, [3] yayingomunye wabafake izicelo ku-Maryland Racing Commission (MRC) ukuze bathole amalayisense emijaho. [4] Izicelo ezine zivunyiwe: i-Ocean Downs, i-Laurel Raceway, i-Rosecroft Raceway, ne- Baltimore Raceway . [4]

english_source: The racing seasons at Ocean Downs and the other harness tracks were continually extended over the years to keep pace with other mid-Atlantic tracks.[11] By 1984, harness racing was a year-round sport in Maryland, with Ocean Downs open from May to September.[12] In 1986, the MRC expressed grave concerns about the maintenance of Ocean Downs and said it might not approve the continued licensure of the track's management.[13] Under pressure, the track's president, John Howard Burbage, sold his 68 percent stake to Rosecroft Raceway for $2 million.[14][15] The track was renamed as Delmarva Downs the following year.[15] In 1987, real estate developer Mark Vogel bought Rosecroft Raceway, and Delmarva Downs along with it.[16] Vogel allegedly diverted funds from the tracks to support failed real estate ventures, and filed for bankruptcy after being arrested on drug charges.[17] California philanthropist Frederick Weisman bought the two tracks out of bankruptcy in 1991.[18]
target1_text: Izinkathi zomjaho e-Ocean Downs kanye namanye amathrekhi amahhanisi ayelokhu enwetshwa ngokuqhubekayo phakathi neminyaka ukuze ahambisane namanye amathrekhi amaphakathi ne-Atlantic. [1] Ngo-1984, umjaho wamahhanisi wawuwumdlalo wonyaka wonke eMaryland, kanti i-Ocean Downs yayivulwa kusukela ngoMeyi kuya kuSepthemba. [2] Ngo-1986, i-MRC yazwakalisa ukukhathazeka okukhulu ngokulungiswa kwe-Ocean Downs futhi yathi ingase ingakugunyazi ukuqhubeka nokuvunyelwa kwabaphathi bengoma. [3] Engaphansi kwengcindezi, umongameli wengoma, uJohn Howard Burbage, udayisele iRosecroft Raceway ingxenye yakhe engamaphesenti angu-68 ngo-$2 million. [4] [5] Ingoma yaqanjwa kabusha ngokuthi yiDelmarva Downs ngonyaka olandelayo. [5] Ngo-1987, umakhi wezindlu uMark Vogel wathenga iRosecroft Raceway, kanye neDelmarva Downs kanye nayo. [6] UVogel kusolakala ukuthi waphambukisa imali kumathrekhi ukuze asekele amabhilidi ahlulekile, futhi wafaka isicelo sokuqothuka ngemuva kokuboshwa ngamacala ezidakamizwa. [7] Isazi saseCalifornia uFrederick Weisman sathenga amathrekhi amabili ekuqoqweni ngo-1991 [8]

english_source: A citizen detective, also known as an amateur detective, is an individual who devotes his or her time and expertise to aid in the solving of crime, without compensation or expectation of reward.[5] Citizen detectives are private citizens that have no real professional relationship with law enforcement and lack any rational-legal authority whatsoever. The reasons why a private citizen might try to solve a crime vary from trying to ensure justice for a friend or relative, a strong dislike for crime and support for law and order, or just recreational enjoyment.

english_source: Founded in 1902 as Madrid Football Club, the club has traditionally worn a white home kit since its inception. The honorific title real is Spanish for "royal" and was bestowed to the club by King Alfonso XIII in 1920 together with the royal crown in the emblem. Real Madrid have played their home matches in the 81,044-capacity Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in downtown Madrid since 1947 and Real Madrid is also the most successful team in the FIFA Club World Cup, having been crowned winners 5 times since the tournament first started in 2000. Unlike most European sporting entities, Real Madrid's members (socios) have owned and operated the club throughout its history. The club is one of the most widely supported in the world,[6] and was estimated to be worth $5.1 billion in 2022, making it the world's most valuable football team.[7] In 2021, it was the second highest-earning football club in the world, with an annual revenue of €640.7 million.[8]
target1_text: Isungulwe ngo-1902 njenge-Madrid Football Club, leli qembu ngokwesiko liyelagqoka ikhithi yasekhaya elimhlophe kusukela ekuqaleni kwalo. Isiqu esihloniphekile i-Real ngesiSpanishi esisho "isobukhosi" futhi sanikezwa leli qembu yiNkosi u-Alfonso XIII ngo-1920 kanye nomqhele wasebukhosini esifanekisweni. I-Real Madrid idlale imidlalo yayo yasekhaya eSantiago Bernabéu Stadium enabantu abangu-81,044 edolobheni laseMadrid kusukela ngo-1947 futhi i-Real Madrid nayo iyiqembu eliphumelela kakhulu kwi-FIFA Club World Cup, njengoba inqobe izikhathi ezinhlanu selokhu umncintiswano waqala ngo-2000. Ngokungafani nezinhlangano eziningi zezemidlalo zaseYurophu, amalungu e-Real Madrid (amasocios) aye aphethe futhi aphathe leli qembu kuwo wonke umlando walo. Leli qembu lingelinye lamaqembu asekelwa kabanzi emhlabeni, futhi kulinganiselwa ukuthi libiza ama-$5.1 billion ngo-2022, okwenza kube yiqembu lebhola likanobhutshuzwayo eliyigugu kakhulu emhlabeni.[1][2] Ngo-2021, kwakuyiqembu lebhola likanobhutshuzwayo lesibili elihola kakhulu emhlabeni, ngenzuzo yaminyaka yonke eyizigidi ezingama-€640.7 miliyoni.[3]

english_source: Delaware Park (also known as DelPark) is an American Thoroughbred horse racing track, casino, and golf course in Stanton, Delaware. It is located just outside the city of Wilmington, and about 30 miles from Philadelphia.
target1_text: IDelaware Park (ephinde yaziwe ngokuthi iDelPark ) iyithrekhi yomjaho wamahhashi waseMelika Thoroughbred, amakhasino, kanye nenkundla yegalofu eStanton, eDelaware . Itholakala ngaphandle nje kwedolobha laseWilmington, futhi cishe ngamamayela angu-30 ukusuka ePhiladelphia .
target2_text: IDelaware Park (ephinde yaziwe ngokuthi iDelPark ) Iyithrekhi yomjaho wamahhashi waseMelika, amakhasino, kanye nenkundla yegalofu eStanton, eDelaware. Itholakala ngaphandle kweDolobha laseWilmington, futhi icishe ngamamayela angu-30 ukusuka ePhiladelphia.

english_source: After the German reunification in 1990, Reiner Calmund was quick to sign East German stars Ulf Kirsten, Andreas Thom and Jens Melzig. The three players would become instant crowd favourites, and make significant contributions to the team. Calmund also established groundbreaking contacts in Brazilian football, befriending Juan Figer, one of Brazil's most powerful player agents. Over the next few years, budding superstars, such as Jorginho and Paulo Sérgio, joined the team, as did Czech star Pavel Hapal. The club also signed charismatic players, such as Bernd Schuster, and Rudi Völler, helping to ensure the team's popularity and growing success.
target1_text: Ngemva kokuhlanganiswa kweJalimane ngo-1990, uReiner Calmund washesha ukusayina izihlabani zaseMpumalanga Jalimane u-Ulf Kirsten, u-Andreas Thom noJens Melzig. Laba badlali abathathu bazoba yizintandokazi zezihlwele ngokushesha, futhi babe negalelo elikhulu eqenjini. I-Calmund iphinde yasungula othintana nabo ababalulekile ebholeni lase-Brazil, yaba umngane no-Juan Figer, omunye wabadlali abanamandla kakhulu e-Brazil. Eminyakeni embalwa eyalandela, ama-superstars asafufusa, njengoJorginho no-Paulo Sérgio, bajoyine iqembu, njengoba kwenza inkanyezi yaseCzech uPavel Hapal. Iqembu liphinde lasayina abadlali abanothando, njengoBernd Schuster, kanye no-Rudi Völler, okusiza ukuqinisekisa ukuthandwa kweqembu kanye nempumelelo ekhulayo.

english_source: Bayer 04 Leverkusen Fußball GmbH, also known as Bayer 04 Leverkusen (German: [ˌbaɪ̯ɐ ˈleːvɐˌkuːzn̩]), Bayer Leverkusen, or simply Leverkusen, is a professional football club based in Leverkusen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.[4] The club competes in the Bundesliga, the top tier of German football, and plays its home matches at the BayArena.[1][5]
target1_text: I-Bayer 04 Leverkusen Fußball GmbH, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- Bayer 04 Leverkusen ( German: [ˌbaɪ̯ɐ ˈleːvɐˌkuːzn̩] ), iBayer Leverkusen, noma umane uLeverkusen, iyikilabhu lebhola lezinyawo elikhokhelwayo elizinze eLeverkusen, eNyakatho yeRhine-Westphalia, eJalimane. [1] Ikilabhu iqhudelana kuBundesliga, isigaba esiphezulu sebhola laseGermany, futhi idlala imidlalo yayo yasekhaya e - BayArena . [2]
target2_text: I-Bayer 04 Leverkusen Fußball GmbH, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- Bayer 04 Leverkusen ( German: [ˌbaɪ̯ɐ ˈleːvɐˌkuːzn̩] ), iBayer Leverkusen, noma umane uLeverkusen, iyikilabhu lebhola lezinyawo elikhokhelwayo elizinze eLeverkusen, eNyakatho yeRhine-Westphalia, eJalimane. Ikilabhu iqhudelana kuBundesliga, isigaba esiphezulu sebhola laseGermany, futhi idlala imidlalo yayo yasekhaya e-BayArena. [1]

english_source: The club captured its next honour in 1993 with a 1–0 win in the DFB-Pokal over a surprising Hertha BSC amateur squad on 12 June 1993.[1][12] In the following season, in a game also known for its 45 m "German Goal of the Year" by Schuster (a goal which was later also named "Goal of the Decade"), Bayer played Eintracht Frankfurt early in the season, and, as both a "tip of the hat" to its own history as well as an attempt to perhaps upset the Frankfurt team, Bayer played in its new third colours, which were old-fashioned red and black stripes, similar jerseys to those Frankfurt generally wore at the time. This proved so popular with the fans that, very shortly thereafter, the team reverted to its "retro" colours of red and black, colours used on all home jerseys ever since.
target1_text: Ikilabhu yathola ukuhlonishwa kwayo okulandelayo ngo-1993 ngokuwina kwe-1-0 ku- DFB-Pokal ngeqembu elimangalisayo le- Hertha BSC labasafufusa ngomhla ziyi-12 kuJuni 1993. [1] [2] Ngesizini elandelayo, emdlalweni owaziwa nangokuthi "Igoli Lonyaka LaseJalimane" elingu-45 m ka-Schuster (igoli kamuva elaqanjwa ngokuthi "Igoli Leminyaka Eyishumi"), i-Bayer yadlala ne-Eintracht Frankfurt ekuqaleni kwesizini, futhi, "njengethiphu lesigqoko" emlandweni wayo kanye nomzamo wokucasula iqembu laseFrankfurt, iBayer idlale ngemibala yayo yesithathu emisha, okwakuyimigqa yakudala ebomvu nemnyama, amajezi afana nalawo avame ukugqokwa yiFrankfurt. ngaleso sikhathi. Lokhu kubonakale kudume kakhulu kubalandeli kangangokuthi, ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, iqembu labuyela emibalabala yalo "ye-retro" ebomvu nemnyama, imibala esetshenziswa kuwo wonke amajezi asekhaya kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.

Ngesizini elandelayo, emdlalweni owaziwa nangokuthi "Igoli Lonyaka LaseJalimane" elingu-45 m ka-Schuster (igoli kamuva elaqanjwa ngokuthi "Igoli Leminyaka Eyishumi"), i-Bayer yadlala ne-Eintracht Frankfurt ekuqaleni kwesizini, futhi, "njengethiphu lesigqoko" emlandweni wayo kanye nomzamo wokucasula iqembu laseFrankfurt. iBayer idlale ngemibala yayo yesithathu emisha, okwakuyimigqa yakudala ebomvu nemnyama, amajezi afana nalawo avame ukugqokwa yiFrankfurt ngaleso sikhathi. Lokhu kubonakale kudume kakhulu kubalandeli kangangokuthi, ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, iqembu labuyela emibalabala yalo "ye-retro" ebomvu nemnyama, imibala esetshenziswa kuwo wonke amajezi asekhaya kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.

english_source: After a near disaster in 1996 when the club faced a relegation battle, Bayer Leverkusen established itself as a powerful side, offering a technically pleasing offensive style of play under new coach Christoph Daum, who was also helped by the signing of players such as Lúcio, Emerson, Zé Roberto and Michael Ballack. Daum was later to be famously fired for a cocaine scandal that also cost him his ascent to the role of the Germany national team coach.[13][14]
target1_text: Ngemva kwenhlekelele eseduze ku-1996 lapho iqembu libhekene nempi yokuxoshwa, i-Bayer Leverkusen yazisungula njengeqembu elinamandla, ihlinzeka ngesitayela esicasulayo sobuchwepheshe sokudlala ngaphansi komqeqeshi omusha uChristoph Daum, owasizwa futhi ngokusayinwa kwabadlali abafana noLúcio, Emerson, Zé Roberto kanye noMichael Ballack. UDaum ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wabe esedume ngokuxoshwa ngecala le-kokhaini okwamlahlekisela nokunyukela esikhundleni sokuba ngumqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe laseGermany . [1] [2]
target2_text: Ngemva kwenhlekelele eseduze ku-1996 lapho iqembu libhekene nempi yokuxoshwa, i-Bayer Leverkusen yazisungula njengeqembu elinamandla, ihlinzeka ngesitayela esicasulayo sobuchwepheshe sokudlala ngaphansi komqeqeshi omusha uChristoph Daum, owasizwa futhi ngokusayinwa kwabadlali abafana noLúcio, Emerson, Zé Roberto kanye noMichael Ballack . UDaum ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wabe esedume ngokuxoshwa ngecala le -cocaine okwamlahlekisela nokunyukela esikhundleni sokuba ngumqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe laseGermany . [1] [2]

english_source: The team earned a series of four-second-place finishes from 1997 to 2002. The finishes of 2000 and 2002 were heart-breaking for supporters as on both occasions the team had the Bundesliga title within its grasp. In 2000, Bayer Leverkusen needed only a draw against SpVgg Unterhaching to win the title, but an own goal by Michael Ballack helped send the team to a crushing 2–0 defeat, while Bayern Munich clinched the title with a 3–1 victory over Werder Bremen. Two years later, the club surrendered a five-point lead atop the league table by losing two of its last three matches while Borussia Dortmund swept ahead with three consecutive victories in its final matches. The 2002 season has been dubbed the "Treble Horror", as Bayer Leverkusen were also beaten 4–2 in the DFB-Pokal final by Schalke 04 and lost the UEFA Champions League final 2–1 to Real Madrid, which also led to some of the English-language media dubbing them "Neverkusen".[15][16][17] Leverkusen was the first team to reach the final of the Champions League without ever having won a national championship.[18] In addition, five members of the Bayer Leverkusen team were also members of the Germany national team who lost in the final of the World Cup in the same year.
target1_text: Iqembu lithole uchungechunge lokuqeda endaweni yesibili kusukela ngo-1997 kuya ku-2002. Ukuqedwa kwe-2000 kanye ne-2002 kwabadabukisa kakhulu abasekeli njengoba kuzo zombili izikhathi iqembu libe nesicoco seBundesliga ngaphakathi kwalo. Ngo-2000, iBayer Leverkusen yayidinga kuphela ukulingana ibhekene neSpVgg Unterhaching ukuze iwine isicoco, kodwa igoli lakhe likaMichael Ballack lasiza iqembu lahlulwa ngo 2-0, kwathi iBayern Munich yanqoba isicoco ngokunqoba ngo 3-1 kuWerder Bremen. Ngemuva kweminyaka emibili, ikilabhu yanikezela ngamaphuzu amahlanu esicongweni seligi ngokuhlulwa imidlalo yayo emibili kwemithathu edlule kwathi iBorussia Dortmund yadlula ngokunqoba okuthathu kulandelana emidlalweni yayo yokugcina. Isizini ka-2002 ibizwe nge-"Treble Horror", njengoba iBayer Leverkusen iphinde yashaywa ngo 4-2 kowamanqamu weDFB-Pokal yiSchalke 04 futhi yahlulwa kowamanqamu weUEFA Champions League ngo 2-1 ishaywa yiReal Madrid, okuholele nakwabanye imidiya yolimi lwesiNgisi ibabiza ngokuthi "Neverkusen". ILeverkusen ibe yiqembu lokuqala ukufinyelela kowamanqamu weChampions League ngaphandle kokuwina umqhudelwano kazwelonke. Ngaphezu kwalokho, amalungu amahlanu eqembu leBayer Leverkusen nawo abengamalungu eqembu lesizwe laseJalimane elahlulwa kowamanqamu eNdebeni yoMhlaba ngonyaka ofanayo.

english_source: The club went through startling reversals of fortune in the next two seasons. In the 2002 off-season, the team lost influential midfield stars Michael Ballack and Zé Roberto to archrivals Bayern Munich. The team then flirted with relegation through most of the 2002–03 season, leading to the firing of Klaus Toppmöller, who had coached the team during its most successful year, and he was replaced by the inexperienced Thomas Hörster. Charismatic coach Klaus Augenthaler took up the reins in the last two games of the season and helped avoid disaster with a win over his previous club, 1. FC Nürnberg. He then led Bayer Leverkusen to a third-place finish and a Champions League place the following year.
target1_text: Iqembu lidlule ezinguqukweni ezimangazayo zenhlanhla kumasizini amabili alandelayo. Ngesizini engasebenzi ka-2002, iqembu lalahlekelwa yizihlabani zasenkabeni yenkundla uMichael Ballack kanye noZé Roberto kuBayern Munich. Iqembu labe selidlala ngothando ngokuhlehliswa esikhathini esiningi sesizini ka-2002-03, okuholele ekuxoshweni kuka-Klaus Toppmöller, owayeqeqeshe iqembu phakathi kwenyanga ophumelele kakhulu, futhi esikhundleni sakhe kwathathwa uThomas Hörster owayengenalwazi. Umqeqeshi weCharismatic u-Klaus Augenthaler uthathe izintambo emidlalweni emibili yokugcina yesizini futhi wasiza ukugwema inhlekelele ngokunqoba ikilabhu yakhe yangaphambilini, 1. FC Nürnberg. Ibe esehola iBayer Leverkusen yayqeda endaweni yesithathu kwathi ngonyaka olandelayo yayena kuChampions League.

Ube esehola iBayer Leverkusen yaqeda endaweni yesithathu kwathi ngonyaka olandelayo yangena kuChampions League.

english_source: Bayer Leverkusen's corporate origins, however, are far from unique. Other clubs, including PSV, Carl Zeiss Jena and Sochaux, share a similar reputation of being works teams.[40][41] As distinguished from the various Red Bull teams (Salzburg, New York and Leipzig) which has been established or redefined in the recent past primarily for commercial reasons, the formation of Bayer Leverkusen was motivated by the idea of promoting the living conditions of local factory workers early in the 20th century. In view of this tradition, UEFA allows Bayer Leverkusen to use the brand name Bayer in European club competitions while disallowing such naming practices most notably to Red Bull Salzburg.[42]
target1_text: Imvelaphi yenkampani yeBayer Leverkusen, nokho, ayihlukile neze. Amanye amakilabhu, ahlanganisa i-PSV, u-Carl Zeiss Jena kanye ne -Sochaux, abelana ngesithunzi esifanayo sokuba amaqembu emisebenzi . [1] [2] Njengoba ihlukaniswe emaqenjini ahlukahlukene e-Red Bull ( Salzburg, New York kanye ne -Leipzig ) eye yasungulwa noma yachazwa kabusha esikhathini esidlule ngokuyinhloko ngenxa yezizathu zezentengiselwano, ukwakhiwa kwe-Bayer Leverkusen kwagqugquzelwa umbono wokuthuthukisa izimo zokuphila zabasebenzi basefekthri basendaweni. ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama-20. Ngenxa yaleli siko, i-UEFA ivumela i-Bayer Leverkusen ukuthi isebenzise igama lomkhiqizo i-Bayer emiqhudelwaneni yamakilabhu aseYurophu kuyilapho ingavumeli imikhuba enjalo yokuqamba ikakhulukazi iRed Bull Salzburg. [3]

english_source: These are the mildest form of toners; they contain water and a humectant such as glycerine, and little if any alcohol (0–10%). Humectants help to keep the moisture in the upper layers of the epidermis by preventing it from evaporating. A popular example of this is rosewater.

Ama-Humectants asiza ekugcineni umswakama osezingqimbeni ezingenhla ze- epidermis ngokuwuvimbela ukuba ungahwamuki . Isibonelo esidumile salokhu i- rosewater .

english_source: Time is the continued sequence of existence and events that occurs in an apparently irreversible succession from the past, through the present, into the future.[1][2][3] It is a component quantity of various measurements used to sequence events, to compare the duration of events or the intervals between them, and to quantify rates of change of quantities in material reality or in the conscious experience.[4][5][6][7] Time is often referred to as a fourth dimension, along with three spatial dimensions.[8]

english_source: Public infrastructure is infrastructure owned or available for use by the public (represented by the government). It is distinguishable from generic or private infrastructure in terms of policy, financing, purpose, etc.

english_source: In economics, distribution is the way total output, income, or wealth is distributed among individuals or among the factors of production (such as labour, land, and capital).[1] In general theory and in for example the U.S. National Income and Product Accounts, each unit of output corresponds to a unit of income. One use of national accounts is for classifying factor incomes[2] and measuring their respective shares, as in national Income. But, where focus is on income of persons or households, adjustments to the national accounts or other data sources are frequently used. Here, interest is often on the fraction of income going to the top (or bottom) x percent of households, the next x percent, and so forth (defined by equally spaced cut points, say quintiles), and on the factors that might affect them (globalization, tax policy, technology, etc.).
target1_text: Emkhakheni wezomnotho, ukusatshalaliswa yindlela umkhiqizo ophelele, imali engenayo, noma ingcebo ehlukaniswa ngayo phakathi kwabantu noma phakathi kwezici zokukhiqiza (njengomsebenzi, umhlaba, kanye nemali).[1]
target2_text: Kwezomnotho, ukwabiwa kuyindlela umkhiqizo ophelele, imalingeniso, noma ingcebo okwabiwa ngayo phakathi kwabantu noma phakathi kwezici zokukhiqiza (njengomsebenzi, umhlaba, kanye nemali).[1]

english_source: A rat race is an endless, self-defeating, or pointless pursuit. The phrase equates humans to rats attempting to earn a reward such as cheese, in vain. It may also refer to a competitive struggle to get ahead financially or routinely.

english_source: Emotions are mental states brought on by neurophysiological changes, variously associated with thoughts, feelings, behavioral responses, and a degree of pleasure or displeasure.[1][2][3][4] There is no scientific consensus on a definition.[5][6] Emotions are often intertwined with mood, temperament, personality, disposition, or creativity.[7]

english_source: The Zion Christian Church (ZCC) is one of the largest African-initiated churches operating across Southern Africa, and is part of the African Zionism movement.[1] The church's headquarters are at Zion City Moria in Limpopo Province (old Northern Transvaal), South Africa.
target1_text: IBandla LobuKristu LaseZiyoni (I-ZCC) lingelinye lamakhulu kakhulu emasontweni asungulwe e-Afrika akhona eNingizimu Afrika, futhi liyingxenye yenhlangano yeZionism yase-Afrika.[1] Indlunkulu yesonto iseZion City Moria esifundazweni saseLimpopo (i-Northern Transvaal endala), eNingizimu Afrika.
target2_text: ISonto LobuKristu LaseZiyoni (I-ZCC) lingelinye lamasonto amakhulu kakhulu ase-Afrika asebenza eNingizimu Afrika, futhi liyingxenye yenhlangano yeZionism yase-Afrika.[1] Indlunkulu yesonto iseZion City Moria esifundazweni saseLimpopo (i-Northern Transvaal endala), eNingizimu Afrika.

english_source: From top to bottom: the star and crescent (Islam), the cross (Christianity), and the Star of David (Judaism) are the symbols commonly used to represent the three largest Abrahamic religions.
target1_text: Kusukela phezulu kuya phansi: inkanyezi ne-crescent (Islam), isiphambano (UbuKristu), ne-Star of David (UbuJuda) yizimpawu ezivame ukusetshenziswa ukumelela izinkolo ezintathu ezinkulu zika-Abrahama.
target2_text: Kusukela phezulu kuya phansi: inkanyezi ne-crescent (Islam), isiphambano (UbuKristu), ne-"nkanyezi kaDavide" (UbuJuda) yizimpawu ezivame ukusetshenziswa ukumelela izinkolo ezintathu ezinkulu zika-Abrahama.

english_source: The term Abrahamic religion is an irenic category to group the three major religions Judaism, Christianity and Islam together, due to their historical coexistence and competion,[1][2] based around a figure Abraham, mentioned in the Hebrew Bible, the Christian Bibles, and the Quran. It is used to show similarities between those religions and put them in contrast to Indian religions, Iranian religions, and the East Asian religions, although other religions and belief-systems, such as Zorastrianism, Manichaeism, and Gnosticism, may include a figure of Abraham as well.[3][4]
target1_text: Igama elithi Inkolo ka-Abrahama liyisigamu se-Iranian sokuhlanganisa izinkolo ezintathu ezinkulu UbuJuda, UbuKristu UbuSulumane ndawonye, ngenxa yokuba khona kwabo komlando kanye nokuncintisana, [1] [2] okusekelwe kumuntu U-Abrahama, okukhulunywa ngaye eBhayibhelini lesiHebheru, AmaBhayibheli obuKristu, kanye IKoran. Isetshenziselwa ukubonisa ukufana phakathi kwalezo zinkolo futhi iziqhathanise Izinkolo zaseNdiya, Izinkolo zase-Iran, nezinkolo ze-East Asia, yize ezinye izinkolo nezinhlelo zezinkolelo, njenge-Zorastrianism, i-Manichaeism, ne-Gnosticism, zingase zihlanganise nesithombe sika-Abrahama.[3][4]
target2_text: Igama elithi Inkolo ka-Abrahama liyisigamu se-Iranian sokuhlanganisa izinkolo ezintathu ezinkulu UbuJuda, UbuKristu UbuSulumane ndawonye, ngenxa yokuba khona kwabo emlansweni kanye nokuncintisana, [1] [2] okusekelwe kumuntu ongu-Abrahama, okukhulunywa ngaye eBhayibhelini lesiHebheru, AmaBhayibheli obuKristu, kanye neKoran. Isetshenziselwa ukubonisa ukufana phakathi kwalezo zinkolo futhi iziqhathanise neZinkolo zaseNdiya, Izinkolo zase-Iran, nezinkolo zeMpumalanga ye-Eshiya, yize ezinye izinkolo nezinhlelo zezinkolelo, njengeZorastrianism, iManichaeism, neGnosticism, zingase zihlanganise nesiqu sika-Abrahama.[3][4]

english_source: Abrahamic religions make up the largest major division in comparative religion.[5] By total number of adherents, Christianity and Islam comprise the largest and second-largest religious movements in the world, respectively.[6] [page needed] Judaism with much fewer adherents. Other religions, such as Baháʼí Faith, Druzism, Samaritanism, and Rastafari, are considered offshots of the Abrahamic religions.[1]
target1_text: Izinkolo zika-Abrahama zakha ukuhlukaniswa okukhulu kakhulu enkolweni yokuqhathanisa. Inani eliphelele labalandeli, ubuKristu nobuSulumane bakha izinhlangano zenkolo ezinkulu futhi zesibili ngobukhulu emhlabeni, ngokulandelana.  UbuJuda obunabalandeli abambalwa kakhulu. Ezinye izinkolo, njengeBahá'í Faith, iDruzism, iSamariya, neRastafari, zibhekwa njengeziphambeko zezinkolo zika-Abrahama.[1]
target2_text: Izinkolo zika-Abrahama zakha ukuhlukaniswa okukhulu kakhulu enkolweni yokuqhathanisa.[5] [6] eliphelele labalandeli, ubuKristu nobuSulumane bakha izinhlangano zenkolo ezinkulu futhi zesibili ngobukhulu emhlabeni, ngokulandelana.   [ikhasi lidingekayo] UbuJuda obunabalandeli abambalwa kakhulu. Ezinye izinkolo, njenge-Bahá'í Faith, i-Druzism, i-Samariya, ne-Rastafari, zibhekwa njengeziphambeko zezinkolo zika-Abrahama.[1]

english_source: Potjiekos, literally translated to "small pot food", is a stew prepared outdoors in a traditional round, cast iron, three-legged pot. This one is being cooked on a barbecue.
target1_text: I-Potjiekos, ngokwezwi nezwi ehunyushwe ngokuthi "ukudla okuncane kwebhodwe", iyisobho elenziwe ngaphandle ebhodweni eliyindilinga, lensimbi, elinemilenze emithathu. Lokhu kuphekwa nge-barbecue.
target2_text: I-Potjiekos, ngokuhumusha ngokwezwi nezwi "ukudla okuncane kwebhodwe", iyisobho eliphekelwa ngaphandle ebhodweni eliyindilinga, lensimbi, elinemilenze emithathu. Lokhu kuphekwa nge-barbecue.

english_source: Freedom Day is a public holiday in South Africa celebrated on 27 April.[1] It commemorates the first post-apartheid elections held on that day in 1994 and the day on which the new constitution was introduced. The elections were the first national elections where everyone of voting age of over 18 from any race group,[2] was allowed to vote.
target1_text: Usuku Lwenkululeko liyiholide lomphakathi eNingizimu Afrika eligujwa ngo-27 kuMbasa (Ephreli).[1] Ihlonipha ukhetho lokuqala lwangemva Ubandlululo olwalwenziwa ngalolo suku ngo-1994 nosuku umthethosisekelo owamenyezelwa ngalo. Ukhetho lwaluwukhetho lokuqala lukazwelonke lapho wonke umuntu oneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-18[2] ubudala wokuvota kunoma yiliphi iqembu lohlanga, ayevunyelwe ukuvota.
target2_text: Usuku Lwenkululeko liyiholide lomphakathi INingizimu Afrika eligujwa ngo-27 April.[1] Ihlonipha ukhetho lokuqala lwangemva Ubandlululo olwalwenziwa ngalolo suku ngo-1994 nosuku Umthetho-sisekelo omusha owamenyezelwa ngalo. Ukhetho lwaluwukhetho lokuqala lukazwelonke lapho wonke umuntu oneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-[2] ubudala wokuvota kunoma yiliphi iqembu lohlanga, ayevunyelwe ukuvota.

english_source: SADiLaR (the South African Centre for Digital Language Resources), is a Department of Science and Innovation-sponsored initiative to create and manage digital resources and software supporting research and development in digital language resources in South Africa.[1][2]
target1_text: I-SADILaR (i-South African Centre for Digital Language Resources), iyisinyathelo esixhaswa uMnyango Wezesayensi Nokusungula sokwakha nokuphatha imithombo ye-digital kanye ne-software esekela ucwaningo nentuthuko yemithombo yolimi lwe-digital eNingizimu Afrika.[1][2]
target2_text: I-SADILaR (iSouth African Centre for Digital Language Resources), iwuhlelo oluxhaswe nguMnyango Wezesayensi Nokusungula lokwakha nokuphatha imithombo ye-digital kanye ne-nesofthiwe esekela ucwaningo nentuthuko yemithombo yolimi lwe-digital eNingizimu Afrika.[1][2]

english_source: SADiLaR is involved in a collaboration between Wikipedia and the Pan South African Language Board. Together they launched the SWiP project[9] at the University of South Africa in September 2023. SWiP advocates for equality among all indigenous languages and encouraging languages communities in South Africa to become more visible on Wikipedia and post information in their own language.[10]
target1_text: ISADILaR inokusebenzisana phakathi kwe-Wikipedia ne-Pan South African Language Board. Bobabili baqala iphrojekthi ye-SWiP[1] e-University of South Africa kuMandulo 2023. ISWiP ikhuthaza ukulingana phakathi kwazo zonke izilimi zomdabu futhi ikhuthaza imiphakathi yezilimi eNingizimu Afrika ukuba ibonakale kakhulu ku-Wikipedia futhi ithumele ulwazi ngolimi lwayo.[2]
target2_text: I-SADILaR ihilelekile ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-I-Wikipedia ne-Pan South African Language Board. Bobabili baqala iphrojekthi ye-SWiP[1] e-I-University of South Africa ngo-September 2023. I-SWiP ikhuthaza ukulingana phakathi kwazo zonke izilimi zomdabu futhi ikhuthaza imiphakathi yezilimi eNingizimu Afrika ukuba ibonakale kakhulu ku-Wikipedia futhi ithumele ulwazi ngolimi lwayo.[2]

english_source: An idiom is a phrase or expression that usually presents a figurative, non-literal meaning attached to the phrase. Some phrases which become figurative idioms, however, do retain the phrase's literal meaning. Categorized as formulaic language, an idiom's figurative meaning is different from the literal meaning.[1] Idioms occur frequently in all languages; in English alone there are an estimated twenty-five million idiomatic expressions.[2]
target1_text: Isisho siwumusho noma inkulumo evame ukuveza incazelo engokomfanekiso, engekho ngokoqobo enamathele emshweni. Eminye imisho eba yizisho ezingokomfanekiso, nokho, igcina incazelo engokoqobo yomusho. Ihlukaniswe njengolimi oluhleliwe, incazelo engokomfanekiso yesisho ihlukile enchazelweni engokoqobo.[1] Izisho zenzeka kaningi kuzo zonke izilimi; esiNgisi sisodwa kunezisho ezilinganiselwa ezigidini ezingamashumi amabili nanhlanu.[2]
target2_text: isiqubulo siwumusho noma inkulumo evame ukuveza incazelo engokomfanekiso, engekho ngokoqobo enamathele emshweni. Eminye imisho eba yizisho ezingokomfanekiso, nokho, igcina incazelo engokoqobo yomusho. Ihlukaniswe njengolimi oluhleliwe, incazelo engokomfanekiso yesisho ihlukile enchazelweni engokoqobo.[1] Izilimi zenzeka kaningi kuzo zonke izilimi; ngesiNgisi kuphela kunamazwi alinganiselwa ezigidini ezingamashumi amabili nanhlanu.[2]

english_source: Idioms possess varying degrees of mobility. Whereas some idioms are used only in a routine form, others can undergo syntactic modifications such as passivization, raising constructions, and clefting, demonstrating separable constituencies within the idiom.[10] Mobile idioms, allowing such movement, maintain their idiomatic meaning where fixed idioms do not:
target1_text: Izisho zinamazinga ahlukahlukene okuhamba. Nakuba ezinye izisho zisetshenziswa kuphela ngendlela ejwayelekile, ezinye zingabhekana nezinguquko ze-syntactic ezifana ne-passivation, ukuphakamisa ukwakhiwa, kanye ukuhlukana, okubonisa izigaba ezihlukanisekayo ngaphakathi kwesisho.[1] Izisho ezihambayo, ezivumela ukunyakaza okunjalo, zigcina incazelo yazo lapho Iziqubulo ezizinzile zingenzi khona:

english_source: The University of Zululand or UniZulu is a comprehensive tertiary educational institution north of the uThukela River in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. The university has established partnerships with schools in the United States and Europe such as the University of Mississippi, Radford University, Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University and Chicago State University. UniZulu was founded with the help of the Prince of Phindangene, Mangosuthu Buthelezi, who was also chancellor of the institution when it was established.
target1_text: I-University of Zululand noma I-UniZulu iyisikhungo Imfundo ephakeme enyakatho yoMfula i-uThukela eKwaZulu-Natal, INingizimu Afrika. Inyuvesi isungule ubudlelwano nezikole zase-United States naseYurophu njenge-I-University of Mississippi, i-IRadford University, I-Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University kanye ne-I-Chicago State University. I-UniZulu yasungulwa ngosizo lweNkosana yasePhindangene, I-Mangosuthu Buthelezi, naye owayengumongameli walesi sikhungo lapho sisungulwa.
target2_text: I-Nyuvesi yakwaZulu ephinde yaziwe nge UNIZULU iyisikhungo semfundo ephakeme enyakatho yoMfula i-uThukela KwaZulu-Natal, eNingizimu Afrika. Inyuvesi isungule ubudlelwano nezikole zase-United States naseYurophu njenge-I-University of Mississippi, i-IRadford University, I-Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University kanye ne-I-Chicago State University. I-UniZulu yasungulwa ngosizo lweNkosana yasePhindangene, I-Mangosuthu Buthelezi, naye owayengumongameli walesi sikhungo lapho sisungulwa.

english_source: Similar to some other Bantu religions, adherents of Zulu traditional religion believe in honoring ancestors (Amadlozi). Unkulunkulu is the highest god and is the creator of humanity.[1]
target1_text: Njengamanye izinkolo zamaBantu, abalandeli benkolo yesiko lamaZulu bakholelwa ekuhlonipheni okhokho (Ama-Amadlozi). U-I-Unkulunkulu ungunkulunkulu ophakeme kakhulu futhi ungumsunguli wesintu.[1]
target2_text: [1]Njengezinye izinkolo zamaBantu, abalandeli benkolo yesiko lamaZulu bakholelwa ekuhlonipheni okhokho (Ama-Amadlozi). UUnkulunkulu ungunkulunkulu ophakeme kakhulu futhi ungumsunguli wesintu.[2]

english_source: UmkhuluwoMkhulu ("the greatest one") was created in Uhlanga,[2] a huge swamp of reeds, before he came to Earth. Individuals base their morality or behavior ethics on his judgment or “apprehension of the Ultimate Reality.”
target1_text: UmkhuluwoMkhulu ("Omkhulu Yedwa") wadalelwa Ohlanga, [1] emaxhaphozini amakhulu omhlanga, ngaphambi kokuba afike eMhlabeni. Abantu ngokwendlela yokuziphatha[2] noma ukuziphatha kwabo ekwahluleleni kwakhe noma "ukuqonda i-Ultimate Reality".
target2_text: I-UmkhuluwoMkhulu ("eyokuqala") yadalwa e-I-Uhlanga, [1] amaxhaphozi amakhulu omhlanga, ngaphambi kokuba afike eMhlabeni. Abantu basekela ukuziphatha kwabo noma ukuziphatha kwabo ekwahluleleni kwakhe noma "ukuqonda i-Ultimate Reality".

english_source: Language Barrier is a studio album by Jamaican musical duo Sly and Robbie, released in 1985 by Island Records. The album features guest musicians Herbie Hancock, Bob Dylan, Afrika Bambaataa, and Manu DiBango.
target1_text: I-Language Barrier i-albhamu ye-studio ye-duo yomculo waseJamaica uSly and Robbie, eyakhishwa ngo-1985 yi-Island Records. I-albhamu iqukethe abaculi abavakashile UHerbie Hancock, UBob Dylan, u-I-Afrika Bambaataa, UManu DiBango.
target2_text: Uhlangothi lwelimi i-albhamu ye-studio ye-duo yomculo wase Jamaica uSly and Robbie, eyakhishwa ngo-1985 yi-Island Records. I-albhamu iqukethe abaculi abavakashile UHerbie Hancock, UBob Dylan, u-I-Afrika Bambaataa, UManu DiBango.

english_source: The Blood River Vlei, located about 20 km to the south-west of Vryheid, is one of the biggest inland wetlands in South Africa and the wintering place of migratory birds such as ducks and geese.[6]
target1_text: I-Blood River I-Vlei, etholakala ebangeni elingamakhilomitha angaba ngu-20 eningizimu-ntshonalanga yeVryheid, ingenye Izindawo ezingamaxhaphozi ezinkulu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika kanye nendawo yokuchitha ubusika yezinyoni ezifudukayo njengamadada namahansi.[1]
target2_text: I-Blood River itholakala ebangeni elingamakhilomitha angaba ngu-20 eNingizimu-Ntshonalanga yedolobha lase-Vryheid, ingenye yezindawo ezingamaxhaphozi ezinkulu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika kanye nendawo yokuchitha ubusika yezinyoni ezifudukayo njengamadada namahansi.[1]

english_source: The town began as a makeshift harbour that was set up by Commodore of the Cape, Sir Markus Eugene Brown, during the Anglo-Zulu War of 1879. In 1902, Cathcart Methven, the harbour engineer for the Natal Government, in his Zululand Port Survey recognized the potential of Richards Bay as a new harbour for the eastern shore.[4]
target1_text: Leli dolobha laqala njengetheku lesikhashana elasungulwa nguCommodore waseKapa, USir Markus Eugene Brown, ngesikhathi seMpi ye-Anglo-Zulu ka-1879. Ngo-1902, uCathcart Methven, unjiniyela wechweba kaHulumeni waseNatal, ku-Zululand Port Survey waqaphela amandla e-Richards Bay njengetheku elisha lasogwini olusempumalanga.[1]
target2_text: Leli dolobha laqala njengetheku lesikhashana elasungulwa nguCommodore waseKapa, USir Markus Eugene Brown,[1] ngesikhathi seMpi ye-Anglo-Zulu ka-1879. Ngo-1902, uCathcart Methven, unjiniyela wechweba kaHulumeni waseNatal, ku-Zululand Port Survey wahlonza amandla e-Richards Bay njengetheku elisha olisogwini olusempumalanga nezwe.[1]

english_source: The Port of Richards Bay contains what was once the largest coal export facility in the world, with a planned capacity of 91 million tons per year by the first half of 2009. In 2007 annual throughput was 66.12 million tons. The Australian port of Newcastle, New South Wales is the largest coal-exporting harbour in the world, exporting just over 161 million tonnes of coal in 2016.[10]
target1_text: Ichweba laseRichards Bay liqukethe lokho okuyisikhungo samalahle esingabalwa kwesikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni, esinomthamo ohleliwe wamathani ayizigidi ezingu-91 ngonyaka engxenyeni yokuqala ka-2009.[1] Ngo-2007 umkhiqizo waminyaka yonke wawungamathani ayizigidi ezingu-66.12. Itheku lase-Australia laseNewcastle, eNew South Wales liyitheku elikhulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni, lithumela amathani angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-161 amalahle ngo-2016.[2]
target2_text: I-Port of Richards Bay iqukethe lokho okwakuyisikhungo samalahle esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni, esinomthamo ohleliwe wamathani ayizigidi ezingu-91 ngonyaka engxenyeni yokuqala ka-2009. Ngo-2007 umkhiqizo waminyaka yonke wawungamathani ayizigidi ezingu-66.12. Itheku lase-Australia laseNewcastle, eNew South Wales liyitheku elikhulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni, lithumela amathani angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-161 amalahle ngo-2016.[1]

english_source: Apart from the mining industry, tourism is a major part of the economy, with Richards Bay seen as a gateway to Zululand, an area popular with foreign tourists because of its large game parks and the diverse wildlife on offer.
target1_text: Ngaphandle kwemboni yezimayini, ezokuvakasha ziyingxenye enkulu yomnotho, kanti iRichards Bay iyisango lendlela ebheke eZululand, indawo ethandwa izivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ngenxa yamapaki ayo amakhulu kanye nezilwane zasendle ezihlukahlukene ezinikezwayo.[1]
target2_text: Ngaphandle kwemboni yezimayini, ezokuvakasha ziyingxenye enkulu yomnotho, kanti iRichards Bay ibonakala njengendlela yokuya eZululand, indawo ethandwa izivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ngenxa yamapaki ayo amakhulu kanye nezilwane zasendle ezihlukahlukene ezinikezwayo.

english_source: The Richards Bay area is generally very flat and is situated on a coastal plain. The terrain rises slightly towards the west. The suburbs are all no more than a few metres (Reneging around 140m) (feet 459.3  ft) above sea level. The area is abundant in coastal dune forests, most notably along the coastal dune belt and in the suburb of Meerensee.
target1_text: Indawo yaseRichards Bay ngokuvamile iyithafa kakhulu futhi isethafeni elingasogwini. Indawo ikhuphuka kancane ngasentshonalanga. Amadolobhana angaphandle angaphezu kwamamitha ambalwa (Reneging cishe 140m) (amamitha angu-459.3) ngaphezu kogu lolwandle.  Le ndawo iningi emahlathini ama-dune asogwini, ikakhulukazi eceleni kwe-zindunduma zasogwini nasedolobheni lase-Meerensee.
target2_text: Indawo yaseRichards Bay ngokuvamile iyithafa kakhulu futhi isethafeni elingasogwini. Indawo ikhuphuka kancane ngasentshonalanga. Amadolobhana angaphandle awaphezu kwamamitha ambalwa (Reneging cishe 140m) (amamitha angu-459.3) ngaphezu kogu lolwandle.  Le ndawo iningi emahlathini ama-dune asogwini, ikakhulukazi eceleni kwe-dune belt yasogwini nasedolobheni laseMeerensee.

english_source: In 2015 Richards Bay was selected by the governing body of South African surfing, Surfing South Africa (SSA), to host the South African Surf Championships. South Africa's top provincial surfers gathered to compete at Alkantstrand during the week-long event in August. The contest was handled and coordinated by the local surf club, uThungulu Surfriders (formerly Zululand Surfriders Association).
target1_text: Ngo-2015 iRichards Bay yakhethwa yiqembu elibusayo le-surfing yaseNingizimu Afrika, i-Surfing South Africa (SSA), ukuba ibambe i-South African Surf Championships.[1] Abantwezi abaphambili baseNingizimu Afrika bahlangana ukuze bancintisane e-Alkantstrand phakathi nomcimbi wesonto lonke ngo-Agasti. Lo mncintiswano wawuphethwe futhi uqondiswa yiqembu le-surfing lendawo, i-uThungulu Surfriders (ngaphambili i-Zululand Surfriders Association).
target2_text: Ngo-2015 iRichards Bay yakhethwa yiqembu elibusayo le-surfing yaseNingizimu Afrika, i-Surfing South Africa (SSA), ukuba ibambe i-South African Surf Championships. Abagibeli bezindiza abaphambili baseNingizimu Afrika bahlangana ukuze bancintisane e-Alkantstrand phakathi nomcimbi wesonto lonke ngo-Agasti. Lo mncintiswano wawuphathwa futhi uqondiswa yiqembu le-surfing lendawo, i-uThungulu Surfriders (ngaphambili i-Zululand Surfriders Association).

english_source: King Zwelithini has cooperated as the law requires with the ANC since it took over the reins of government in KwaZulu-Natal. The King's finances are controlled by KwaZulu-Natal provincial authorities.
target1_text: INkosi uZwelithini ibambisene njengoba umthetho udinga ne-ANC selokhu yathatha izintambo zikahulumeni eKwaZulu-Natal. Izimali zeNkosi zilawulwa iziphathimandla zesifundazwe saseKwaZulu-Natal.
target2_text: ISilo uZwelithini sabambisana njengoba umthetho udinga ne-ANC selokhu yathatha izintambo zikahulumeni kwaKwaZulu-Natal. Izimali zeNkosi zilawulwa iziphathimandla zesifundazwe saseKwaZulu-Natal.

english_source: "Steambreather" is a song by American heavy metal band Mastodon. It was the second single off of their album Emperor of Sand, the follow-up to first single "Show Yourself". As of October 2017, it had peaked at number 18 on the Billboard US Mainstream Rock Songs chart.
target1_text: "Steambreather" yingoma yeqembu laseMelika lomculo onesigqi esinamandla I-Mastodon. Kwakuyingoma yesibili ye-albhamu yabo ethi Emperor of Sand, eyalandela ingoma yokuqala ethi "Show Yourself". Kusukela ngoMfumfu ka-2017, yayisifinyelele ezingeni kunombolo 18 to kwi-Billboard US Mainstream Rock Songs chart.
target2_text: "Steambreather" yingoma yeqembu laseMelika lomculo onesigqi esinamandla I-Mastodon. Kwakuyingoma yesibili ye-albhamu yabo ethi Emperor of Sand, eyalandela ingoma yokuqala ethi "Show Yourself". Kusukela ngo-Okthoba 2017, yayisifinyelele ezingeni le-18 ku-I-Billboard US Mainstream Rock Songs chart.

english_source: Samp is a food made from dried corn kernels that have been pounded and chopped until broken, but not as finely ground as mealie-meal or mielie rice. The coating around the kernel loosens and is removed during the pounding and stamping process. It is eaten across South Africa and by the Lozi and Tonga people of Zambia with sugar and sour milk.[1] It can also be served with gravy and various additives. It is cooked with beans in the Xhosa variant of umngqusho and sometimes eaten with chakalaka. It can also be served with beef, lamb, poultry and in stuffings.
target1_text: I-samp ikukudla okwenziwe ngamagobolondo ombila omisiwe aye asikwa futhi asikwa aze aphulwe, kodwa hayi ngokugaywa kahle njengombila noma ilayisi le-mielie. Isembozo esizungeze i-nucleus siyavuleka futhi sisuswe ngenkathi kushaywa futhi kushaywa. Idliwa kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ngabantu baseLozi naseTonga baseZambia noshukela nobisi olubabayo.[1] Ingaphinde idliwe ne-sauce nezithasiselo ezihlukahlukene. Iphekwa nobhontshisi ohlotsheni lwe-Xhosa lwe-umngqusho futhi ngezinye izikhathi idliwa no-chakalaka. Ingaphinde idliwe inyama yenkomo, iwundlu, izinkukhu kanye nokudla.
target2_text: I-samp iwUkudla okwenziwe ngamagobolondo ommbila omisiwe aye asikwa futhi asikwa aze aphulwe, kodwa hhayi ngokugaywa kahle njenge-mealie-meal noma ilayisi le-mielie. Isembozo esizungeze i-nucleus siyavuleka futhi sisuswe ngenkathi kushaywa futhi kushaywa. Idliwa kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ngabantu baseLozi naseTonga baseZambia noshukela nobisi olubabayo.[1] Ingaphinde idliwe ne-sauce nezithasiselo ezihlukahlukene. Iphekwa nobhontshisi ohlotsheni lwe-Xhosa lwe-umngqusho futhi ngezinye izikhathi idliwa no-chakalaka. Ingaphinde idliwe inyama yenkomo, iwundlu, izinkukhu kanye nokudla.

english_source: Mielie meal, also known as mealie meal or maize meal, is a relatively coarse flour (much coarser than cornflour or cornstarch) made from maize[1] or mealies in Southern Africa. It was originally brought to Africa from the Americas by the Portuguese.[2] Its etymology is uncertain, and may be from the Portuguese milho, or the Afrikaans mielie, from obsolete Dutch milie (“millet, maize”). It is also known by various other indigenous language names depending on the locality or country.
target1_text: I-Mielie meal, eyaziwa nangokuthi i-mealie meal noma i-maize meal, i-pour eqinile (eqinile kakhulu kune-cornflour noma i-cornstarch) eyenziwe ngommbila noma Ukudla eNingizimu Afrika. Ekuqaleni yalethwa e-Afrika ivela eMelika ngamaPutukezi.[1] Umsuka wayo awuqinisekile, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi uvela egameni IsiPutukezi elithi i-milho, noma i-Afrikaans I-méelie, elivela egameni lesiDashi elidala elithi milie ("millet, maize"). Yaziwa nangamanye amagama ahlukahlukene ezilimi zomdabu kuye ngendawo noma izwe.
target2_text: I-mielie meal, eyaziwa nangokuthi isidlo sombila noma impuphu, engufulawa (eqinile kakhulu kune-cornflour noma i-cornstarch) eyenziwe ngommbila noma Ukudla eNingizimu Afrika. Ekuqaleni yalethwa e-Afrika ivela eMelika ngamaPutukezi.[1] Umsuka wayo awuqinisekile, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi uvela egameni IsiPutukezi elithi i-milho, noma i-Afrikaans I-méelie, elivela egameni lesiDashi elidala elithi milie ("millet, maize"). Yaziwa nangamanye amagama ahlukahlukene ezilimi zomdabu kuye ngendawo noma izwe.

english_source: The league was founded in 1996 after an agreement between the National Soccer League and the remnants of the National Professional Soccer League. It is stated on its website that the former name still exists today, but for legal purposes, with the Premier Soccer League being its trade name.[2]
target1_text: I-league yasungulwa ngo-1996 ngemuva kwesivumelwano phakathi kwe-I-National Soccer League nezinsalela ze-I-National Professional Soccer League. Kushiwo kuwebhusayithi yayo ukuthi igama langaphambili lisekhona nanamuhla, kodwa ngezinhloso ezingokomthetho, ne-I-Premier Soccer League igama layo lokuhweba.[1]

english_source: The spatial and infrastructural developments of Ntuzuma have emerged incrementally in different sections, and have, to a large extent, influenced the varying service levels, political affiliations and tenure arrangements that prevail in the area.
target1_text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwendawo nokwakhiwa kweNtuzuma kuye kwavela kancane kancane ezingxenyeni ezahlukahlukene, futhi, ngezinga elikhulu, kuthonye amazinga ahlukahlukene ezinkonzo, ukuhlanganiswa kwezombusazwe kanye nezinhlelo zokuphatha ezikhona kule ndawo.
target2_text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwendawo nokwakhiwa kweNtuzuma kuye kwavela kancane ezingxenyeni ezahlukeni, futhi, ngezinga elikhulu, kuthonye amazinga ahlukahlukene ezinkonzo, ukuhlanganiswa kwezombusazwe kanye nezinhlelo zokuphatha ezikhona kule ndawo.

english_source: Large tracts of land are informally occupied due to the pressure for housing and its relative accessibility. With the RDP Housing Programme, a number of formal houses have been given to the people, which has contributed positively to the town's development plans. Ntuzuma exhibits a wide range of housing including some very up-market homes but also includes a large informal settlement. Ntuzuma's population is dominated by the working class. Ntuzuma Township[2] is 12 km from the Durban CBD; it consists of 99.5% of Black community and 0.5% of other. It is situated near KwaMashu, Inanda, and Phoenix areas.
target1_text: Izingxenye eziningi zendawo zinemijondolo ngenxa yengcindezi yezindlu kanye nokufinyeleleka kwazo. Nge-RDP Housing Programme, izindlu eziningi ezingokomthetho zinikezwe abantu, okuye kwaba nengxenye enhle ezinhle ezinhle ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukiswa kwedolobha.I-Ntuzuma ibonisa izindlu eziningi ezihlanganisa ezinye izindlu ezisezingeni eliphezulu kodwa futhi ihlanganisa indawo enkulu yokuhlala engahleliwe. Inani labantu baseNtuzuma libuswa isigaba esisebenzayo.I-Ntuzuma Township[1] ingamakhilomitha angu-12 ukusuka eDurban CBD; iqukethe u-99.5% womphakathi omnyama no-0.5% kwabanye. Itholakala eduze kwezindawo zaseKwaMashu, e-Inanda[2], nasePhoenix.

english_source: Dingane orders the capture of Piet Retief's party of Voortrekkers while they are spectators to a dancing routine of his soldiers.
target1_text: UDingane uyala ukuba kubulawe iqembu likaPiet Retief lamaBhunu ngenkathi bebukela isimiso sokudansa kwamabutho akhe.
target2_text: UDingane uyala ukuba kuthathwe iqembu likaPiet Retief lamaVortrekkers ngenkathi bebukela isimiso sokudansa kwamasosha akhe.

english_source: Bunny chow, often referred to simply as a bunny,[1] is an Indian South African fast food dish consisting of a hollowed-out loaf of white bread filled with curry and a serving of salad on the side. It originated among Indian South Africans of Durban.[2] Throughout various South African communities, one can find cultural adaptations to the original version of the bunny chow, which uses only a quarter loaf of bread and is sometimes called a skhambane, kota ("quarter") or shibobo, a name it shares with sphatlho, a South African dish that evolved from the bunny chow.[3]
target1_text: I-Bunny chow, evame ukubizwa nje ngokuthi i-bunny, [1] isidlo sokudla esisheshayo saseNdiya saseNingizimu Afrika esinesinkwa esimhlophe esivulekile esigcwele i-curry kanye nesidlo Usaladi ohlangothini. Ivela phakathi kwAmaNdiya aseNingizimu Afrika aseDurban.[2] Kuyo yonke imiphakathi ehlukahlukene yaseNingizimu Afrika, umuntu angathola ukuvumelanisa kwamasiko nohlobo lokuqala lwe-bunny chow, olusebenzisa kuphela ingxenye yesine yesinkwa futhi ngezinye izikhathi libizwa ngokuthi I-skhambane, I-kota ("ingxenye yesine") noma i-shibobo, igama elihlanganyela ne-i-sphatlho, isidlo saseNingizimu Afrika esivela ku-bunny Chow.[3]
target2_text: ibunny chow, evame ukubizwa nje ngokuthi i-bunny chow, [1] isidlo sokudla esisheshayo saseNdiya saseNingizimu Afrika esinesinkwa esimhlophe esivulekile esigcwele isishebo kanye nesidlo sesaladi ohlangothini. Ivela phakathi kwamaNdiya aseNingizimu Afrika ethekwini.[2] Kuyo yonke imiphakathi ehlukahlukene yaseNingizimu Afrika, umuntu angathola ukuvumelanisa kwamasiko nohlobo lokuqala lwe-bunny chow, olusebenzisa kuphela ingxenye yesine yesinkwa futhi ngezinye izikhathi libizwa ngokuthi i-skhambane, i-kota ("ingxenye yesine") noma i-shibobo, igama elihlanganyela nesiphahlo, isidlo saseNingizimu Afrika esivela ku-bunny Chow.[3]

english_source: Research into the many possible relationships, intersections and tensions between language and gender is diverse. It crosses disciplinary boundaries, and, as a bare minimum, could be said to encompass work notionally housed within applied linguistics, linguistic anthropology, conversation analysis, cultural studies, feminist media studies, feminist psychology, gender studies, interactional sociolinguistics, linguistics, mediated stylistics, sociolinguistics, and feminist language reform and media studies.
target1_text: Ucwaningo lobudlelwano obuningi obungaba khona, ukuhlangana kanye nokungezwani phakathi kolimi nobulili okuhlukile. Iwela imingcele yokuqeqeshwa, futhi, njengokuncane kakhulu, kungashiwo ukuthi ihlanganisa umsebenzi ohlanganiswe ngaphakathi kwe-applied linguistics, linguistic anthropology, ukuhlaziywa kwezingxoxo, Izifundo zamasiko, Izifundo zemithombo yezindaba zabesifazane, i-feminist psychology, izifundo zobulili, i-interactive sociolinguistics, i-mediated stylistics, isociolinguistics kanye nezinguquko zolimi zabesifazane kanye nezifundo zemithombo.
target2_text: Ucwaningo lobudlelwano obuningi obungaba khona, ukuhlangana kanye nokungezwani phakathi ulimi nobulili kuhlukile. Iwela imingcele yokuqeqeshwa, futhi, njengokuncane kakhulu, kungashiwo ukuthi ihlanganisa umsebenzi ohlanganiswe ngaphakathi kwe-applied linguistics, linguistic anthropology, ingxoxo yokuhlaziywa, Izifundo zamasiko, Izifundo zemithombo yezindaba yabesifazane, i-feminist psychology, izifundo zobulili, i-interactive sociolinguistics, i-mediated stylistics, i'sociolinguistics kanye nezinguquko zolimi zabesifazane kanye nezifundo zemithombo.

english_source: A pig's trotter, also known as a pettitoe,[1] or sometimes known as a pig's foot, is the culinary term for the foot of a pig. The cuts are used in various dishes around the world, and experienced a resurgence in the late 2000s.[2]
target1_text: I-Pig Trotter, ephinde yaziwe nangokuthi i- pettitoe, noma ngezinye izikhathi eyaziwa ngokuthi Unyawo lwengulube, igama lokupheka elisho unyawo lweNgulube.[1] Izingcezu zisetshenziswa ekudleni okuhlukahlukene emhlabeni wonke jikelele, futhi zabuye zavela ngasekupheleni kweminyaka engama-2000.[2]
target2_text: I-Pink Trotter, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- pettitoe, noma ngezinye izikhathi eyaziwa ngokuthi Unyawo lwezIngulube, igama lokupheka elisho unyawo lweNgulube.[1] Izingcezu zisetshenziswa ekudleni okuhlukahlukene emhlabeni wonke, futhi zabuye zavela ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-2000.[2]

english_source: The team has a strong local rivalry with Orlando Pirates, a fellow Soweto team that Chiefs founder Kaizer Motaung played for in his early playing career.[1] Famous players who donned the black-and-gold jersey in the past include former national team captains Neil Tovey and Lucas Radebe as well as Patrick Ntsoelengoe, Gary Bailey, John "Shoes" Moshoeu, Shaun Bartlett, Steve Komphela, Siyabonga Nomvete, and Doctor Khumalo.

Khumalo.

Umsunguli we-Chiefs UKaizer u-Motaung wayedlala kulo ekuqaleni komsebenzi wakhe wokudlala.[1] Abadlali abadumile abagqoke ijazi elimnyama negolide esikhathini esidlule bahlanganisa owayengukaputeni weqembu lesizwe U-Neil Tovey U-Lucas Radebe, U-Patrick Ntsoelengoe, U-Gary Bailey, u-John "Shoes" Moshoeu, U-Shaun Bartlett, U-Steve Komphela, Siyabonga Nomvete, kanye noDkt. Khumalo.

english_source: Kaizer Chiefs were banned by the African Football (CAF) from competing in African club competitions until 2009 after their abrupt withdrawal from the 2005 CAF Confederation Cup. This was the second time in four years that Chiefs had been penalized by CAF for refusal to participate in a competition.
target1_text: I-Kaizer Chiefs yavinjelwa yi-African Football (CAF) ukuba ingancintisani emincintiswaneni yamaqembu ase-Afrika kuze kube ngomnyaka ka-2009 ngemuva kokuhoxa kwabo ngokungazelelwe kwi-CAF Confederation Cup ka-2005. Lesi kwakuyisikhathi sesibili eminyakeni emine ukuthi amaChiefs ajeziswe yi-CAF ngokwenqaba ukuhlanganyela emncintiswaneni.

Lesi kwakuyisikhathi sesibili eminyakeni emine ukuthi amaChiefs ajeziswe yi-CAF ngokwenqaba ukuhlanganyela emncintiswaneni.

english_source: Kaizer Chiefs however only played four of their 15 home games at Rand Stadium in 2010–11, due to some experienced capacity problems, with the transportation related infrastructures around the stadium -and a low spectator attendance. Instead the team during this season, played most of their home games, at the big FNB Stadium -Soccer City.[21]

Esikhundleni salokho iqembu phakathi nalesi sikhathi, ladlala imidlalo yabo eminingi yasekhaya, e-FNB Stadium enkulu e-Soccer City.[1]

english_source: The Shaka Memorial is a provincial heritage site in KwaDukuza in the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa. It marks the resting place of the Zulu King Shaka near the site where he was assassinated by his half-brothers Dingane and Mhlangana while sitting on a rock near the barracks at his capital Dukuza.[1]
target1_text: IShaka Memorial iyIndawo yamagugu yesifundazwe eKwaDukuza esifundazweni saseKwaZulu-Natal INingizimu Afrika. Ibonisa indawo yokuphumula yeNkosi yAmaZulu uShaka eduze nendawo lapho wabulawa khona abafowabo ngomzali oyedwa I-Dingane I-Mhlangana ngenkathi ehlezi edwaleni eduze kwezindlu zempi enhloko-dolobha yakhe IDukuza.[1]
target2_text: Isikhumbuzo sikaShaka siyindawo yemvelaphi yesifundazwe Kwa-Dukuza esifundazweni saKwa-Zulu Natal eNingizimu Afrika. Ibonisa indawo yokuphumula yeNkosi yamaZulu uShaka eduze nendawo lapho wabulawa khona abafowabo ngomzali oyedwa u-Dingane, noMhlangana ngenkathi ehlezi edwaleni eduze kwezindlu zempi enhloko-dolobha yakhe iDukuza.[1]

english_source: Beef tongue (also known as neat's tongue or ox tongue) is a cut of beef made of the tongue of a cow. It can be boiled, pickled, roasted or braised in sauce. It is found in many national cuisines, and is used for taco fillings in Mexico and for open-faced sandwiches in the United States. In France and Belgium it is served with Madeira sauce, while chrain is the preferred accompaniment in Ashkenazi and Eastern European cuisines. Germans make white roux with vinegar and capers, or horseradish cream, which is also popular in Polish cuisine.
target1_text: Ulimi lwenkomo (olwaziwa nangokuthi ulimi lwezinkabi noma ulimi lwenkomo yesilisa) inyama esikwe olimini lwenkomo. Ingabiliswa, ifafazwe, ithosiwe noma ibhekwe nge-sauce. Itholakala ekudleni okuningi kwesizwe, futhi isetshenziselwa ukugcwalisa i-taco eMexico kanye namasemishi anobuso obuvulekile e-United States. EFrance naseBelgium idliwa ne-Madeira sauce, kuyilapho I-chrain iyindlela ethandwa kakhulu ekudleni kwAma-Ashkenazi naseMpumalanga Yurophu. AmaJalimane enza i-roux emhlophe nge-vinegar ne-capers, noma ukhilimu we-horseradish, nawo othandwa ekudleni kwasePoland.

english_source: The horned sungem (Heliactin bilophus) is a species of hummingbird native to much of central Brazil and parts of Bolivia and Suriname. It prefers open habitats such as savanna and grassland and readily occupies human-created habitats such as gardens. It recently expanded its range into southern Amazonas and Espírito Santo, probably as a result of deforestation; few other hummingbird species have recently expanded their range. The horned sungem is a small hummingbird with a long tail and a comparatively short, black bill. The sexes differ markedly in appearance, with males sporting two feather tufts ("horns") above the eyes that are shiny red, golden, and green. Males also have a shiny blue head crest and a black throat with a pointed "beard". The female is plainer and has a brown or yellow-buff throat. The species is the only one within its genus, Heliactin.
target1_text: I-horned sungem (I-Heliactin bilophus) izinhlobo ye-i-hummingbird evela engxenyeni enkulu IBrazil ephakathi nezingxenye IBolivia ISuriname. Ikhetha izindawo ezivulekile ezifana ne-savanna kanye nezindawo ezinotshani futhi ihlala kalula ezindaweni ezenziwe ngabantu njengezingadi. Muva nje yandisa indawo yayo eningizimu ye-Amazon nase-Espírito Santo, mhlawumbe ngenxa Ukuqothulwa kwamahlathi; ezinye izinhlobo ezimbalwa ze-hummingbird muva nje zandisa indawo yazo. I-horned sungem iyinyoni encane enomsila omude nomlomo omfushane, omnyama. ubulili buhlukahluka kakhulu ngokubukeka, ngamaduna anezimpaphe ezimbili ("izimpondo") ngaphezu kwamehlo abomvu ngokugqamile, egolide, noluhlaza. Amaduna futhi ane-crest ekhanda eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka kanye nomphimbo omnyama "nesilevu" esicijile. Insikazi ilula futhi inomphimbo onsundu noma ophuzi. Lolu hlobo luwukuphela kohlobo lwawo, I-heliactin.
target2_text: I-horned sungem (I-Heliactin bilophus) iwuhlobo lwe-i-hummingbird evela engxenyeni enkulu ye-Brazil ephakathi nezingxenye IBolivia ISuriname. Ikhetha izindawo ezivulekile ezifana ne-savanna kanye nezindawo ezinotshani futhi ihlala kalula ezindaweni ezenziwe ngabantu njengezingadi. Lolu hlobo luwukuphela kohlobo lwawo, I-heliactin.

english_source: Ugali, also known as posho, nsima, and other names, is a type of corn meal made from maize or corn flour in several countries in Africa.[1] It is cooked in boiling water or milk until it reaches a stiff or firm dough-like consistency.[2] In 2017, the dish was added to the UNESCO Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, one of a few foods in the list.[3]
target1_text: I-U-Ugali, eyaziwa nangokuthi I-posho, i-maki, namanye amagama, uhlobo Ukudla kommbila olwenziwe ngempuphu noma ufulawa wommbila emazweni amaningana e-Afrika.[1] Iphekwa ngamanzi abilayo noma ubisi kuze kube yilapho ifinyelela ekuguqukeni okuqinile noma okuqinile njengenhlama.[2] Ngo-2017, lesi sidlo sanezelwa ohlwini lwe-UNESCO lwe-Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, olunye lokudla okumbalwa kulolu hlu.[3]
target2_text: I-U-Ugali, eyaziwa nangokuthi I-posho, ipapa, i-maki, kanye namanye amagama, uhlobo lokudla kombila olwenziwe ngempuphu noma ufulawa wombila emazweni amaningana e-Afrika.[1] Iphekwa ngamanzi abilayo noma ubisi kuze kube yilapho ifinyelela ekuguqukeni okuqinile noma okuqinile njengenhlama.[2] Ngo-2017, lesi sidlo sanezezelwa ohlwini lwe-UNESCO lwe-Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, okunye kokudla okumbalwa kulolu hlu.[3]

english_source: Mamelodi Sundowns Football Club (simply known as Sundowns) is a South African professional football club based in Mamelodi, Pretoria in the Gauteng province that plays in the Premier Soccer League, the first tier of South African football league system. Founded in the 1970s, the team plays its home games in the Loftus Versfeld Stadium.
target1_text: IMamelodi Sundowns Football Club (eyaziwa nje ngokuthi yi-Sundowns) iyiqembu ibhola likanobhutshuzwayo laseNingizimu Afrika eliseMamelodi, ePitoli esifundazweni saseGauteng edlala e-I-Premier Soccer League, isigaba sokuqala sesimiso se-football league saseNingizimu Afrika. Isungulwe ngawo-1970, leli qembu lidlala imidlalo yalo yasekhaya I-Loftus Versfeld Stadium.
target2_text: IMamelodi Sundowns Football Club (eyaziwa nje ngokuthi yi-Sundowns) iyiqembu lebhola likanobhutshuzwayo laseNingizimu Afrika eliseMamelodi, ePitoli, esifundazweni saseGauteng. Lidlala kwi--Premier Soccer League, esigabaeni sokuqala sesimiso se-football league laseNingizimu Afrika. Isungulwe ngo-1970, leli qembu lidlala imidlalo yalo yasekhaya e-Loftus Versfeld Stadium.

english_source: Cooking, also known as cookery or professionally as the culinary arts, is the art, science and craft of using heat to make food more palatable, digestible, nutritious, or safe. Cooking techniques and ingredients vary widely, from grilling food over an open fire, to using electric stoves, to baking in various types of ovens, reflecting local conditions. Cooking is an aspect of all human societies and a cultural universal.
target1_text: ukupheka, okwaziwa nangokuthi ukupheka noma ubuciko bokupheka, ubuciko, isayensi nobuciko bokusebenzisa ukushisa ukwenza ukudla kube mnandi, Ukugayeka, okunomsoco, noma iphephile. Amasu nezithako zokupheka zihlukahlukene kakhulu, kusukela ekugaziseni ukudla ngomlilo ovulekile, ekusebenziseni Izitofu zikagesi, ekubhakeni ezinhlotsheni ezahlukahlukene zeziko, okubonisa izimo zendawo.
